MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews, affecting properties in Baker Lane, South Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.43pm. Our engineers are on their way to South Street substation to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.45am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.14pm on Wednesday, 21 October 2020.
